data.event: Eight other settlers arrived in 1838 and growth progressed rapidly after that point.

event.title: was built on McConnell's farm in 1841

data.event: The first school was built on McConnell's farm in 1841 and in 1844 the village was finally platted.
The first school was built on McConnell's farm in 1841 and in 1844 the village was finally platted.
The village of Richmond was officially incorporated in 1872.
